name: Tartarus_Longo_Itinere
description:
Demo version
If you were given the chance to have anything you want, what would you choose? Tartarus is a Dungeon Crawler ín a Card Game size, with PixelArt graphic. Be ready to dive into the Underworld and fight hordes of ruthless monsters to get to the final boss. But your hero won't be alone: other players will try to deceive you and endanger your life, after all…. glory is not to share. Are you sure to give up on your soul for what you desire the most?
